text: Fan coil type (horizontal, vertical, recessed, exposed) and configuration matches mechanical schedule
Coil type (2-pipe/4-pipe, chilled water, hot water, electric) verified with model and performance data
Shop drawings approved: unit dimensions, connection locations, controls, access clearances
Units delivered intact, factory-sealed, with O&M manuals and data plates
Unit installed plumb, level, and securely supported with isolation mounts or hangers
Coil piping connected with unions, isolation valves, balancing valves, and strainers
Drain pans trapped, sloped, insulated, and connected to sanitary drain
Access panels and filters fully accessible per O&M
Fan motors wired and confirmed with correct voltage, phasing, overload protection
Thermostat or BAS control wiring connected and labeled
Condensate pump (if applicable) tested and routed properly
Unit started and airflow verified in all speeds
Coil flows balanced (flow rate GPM verified), delta-T across coil acceptable
Final cleaning and filter installation completed
Warranty forms and closeout documentation submitted
